Text: I See OpportunityBarry In spite of the news in the media about Enron I see opportunity Since weve communicated last Ive been real busy selling my services to major energy traders Actually Enron is one of the traders that have my company listed as one of three or four minority businesses that will be involved with supplying the power for contracts These contracts start at and go up Barry Im going to forge ahead but Id still rather have the opportunity to work and learn from the biggest and best One of my strong points is to get the deal done another is to understand my limitations If you give me the shot on the origination side youd be most pleased If I can convince the worlds largest energy trader to put me on their contracts and RFPs after being in business for less than a year just think what could be done with a supportive back office and timely information What Im seeking is a chance to excel with all the tools at my disposal Drop me a email and tell me your thoughts Tyrone Killebrew Do You Yahoo Find a job post your resume
